00037 #include <isoband.h>
00038 
00039 typedef struct _ISOband_t
00040 {
00041     REAL nominal,
00042          exact,
00043          low,
00044          high;
00045 } ISOband_t;

00092 
00093 PRIVATE INLINE ISOband_t *ISOband_get_info( int band )
00094 {
00095     if ( band < 1 || band > 43 )
00096     {
00097         fprintf( stderr, "ISO: band index out of range (%d)\n", band );
00098         exit( 1 );
00099     }
00100     else
00101         return &_ISOband_info[band - 1];
00102 }
00103 
00104 REAL ISOband_get_nominal( int band )
00105 {
00106     return ISOband_get_info( band )->nominal;
00107 }
00108 
00109 REAL ISOband_get_exact( int band )
00110 {
00111     return ISOband_get_info( band )->exact;
00112 }
00113 
00114 REAL ISOband_get_low( int band )
00115 {
00116     return ISOband_get_info( band )->low;
00117 }
00118 
00119 REAL ISOband_get_high( int band )
00120 {
00121     return ISOband_get_info( band )->high;
00122 }
